snippet: LAINE--John D.,of Ocala, Florida and White Plains, NY died at age 76 on April 4, 2016. He is survived by his wife of fifty five years, Lois Schaffer Laine; his sons, Arthur Laine and his wife Tricia and their children, Jennifer and Amanda Laine; Dean Laine and family. A graveside service will be held at Kensico Cemetery in Valhalla, NY. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LAINE--John D.,of Ocala, Florida and White Plains, NY died at age 76 on April 4, 2016. He is survived by his wife of fifty five years, Lois Schaffer Laine; his sons, Arthur Laine and his wife Tricia and their children, Jennifer and Amanda Laine; Dean Laine and family. A graveside service will be held at Kensico Cemetery in Valhalla, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LAINE, JOHN D.
